physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Dyck score was 72 points; Medical Research Council grade was 3. Unable to feed and dress himself; dependent on a wheelchair. Electroneurography showed complete conduction block proximal to the head of the fibula of the right peroneal nerve, partial conduction block of the left ulnar nerve, and suspected partial motor conduction block of the left peroneal nerve.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Disease progressed with complete conduction block of the right peroneal and left ulnar nerve, and partial conduction block of the left peroneal nerve over time.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Received the first course of rituximab (375 mg/m2 IV once weekly for 4 weeks). No adverse effects reported.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Interval of IVIg administration extended from 7 to 10 days after the first rituximab administration.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Stable clinical condition, able to walk ~500 m with an aid, drives a car, returns to social activities. Needs assistance only for showering and dressing.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Current interval for IVIg administration is 12 days, indicating stabilization of the patient's condition.
